name: NYSTATIN AND TRIAMCINOLONE ACETONIDE
indications: nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream indicated treatment cutaneous candidiasis ; demonstrated nystatin-steroid combination provides greater benefit nystatin component alone first days treatment .
contraindications: nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream usually applied affected areas twice daily morning evening gently thoroughly massaging preparation skin . cream discontinued symptoms persist 25 days therapy ( , laboratory tests ) . nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream used occlusive dressings .
warningsAndPrecautions: nystatin triamcinolone acetonide cream ndc:72162-1433-2 : 15 g tube ndc:72162-1433-3 : 30 g tube ndc:72162-1433-6 : 60 g tube storage : store 20°-25°c ( 68°-77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . avoid freezing . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc. burbank , ca 91504
adverseReactions: preparation contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity components .
indications_original: Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream is indicated for the treatment of cutaneous candidiasis; it has been demonstrated that the nystatin-steroid combination provides greater benefit than the nystatin component alone during the first few days of treatment.
contraindications_original:
Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream is usually applied to the affected areas twice daily in the morning and evening by gently and thoroughly massaging the preparation into the skin. The cream should be discontinued if symptoms persist after 25 days of therapy (see
 
  PRECAUTIONS, Laboratory Tests).

 
                  Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream should not be used with occlusive dressings.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Nystatin and Triamcinolone Acetonide Cream
                  
                  
                     NDC:72162-1433-2: 15 g in a TUBE
 
                  NDC:72162-1433-3: 30 g in a TUBE
                  
                     NDC:72162-1433-6: 60 g in a TUBE
 
                  
                     STORAGE:Store at 20°-25°C (68°-77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Avoid freezing.
 
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:
                  Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.
                  Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: This preparation is contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of its components.
